name: sgvizler2
description: Sgvizler2 is a javascript wrapper for easy visualisation of SPARQL result sets (and a jQuery plugin).
author: Karima Rafes <karima.rafes@bordercloud.com>

scripts.buildall:old: yarn lint && yarn build && yarn build:browser-minify
scripts.build: trash build && yarn build:main && yarn build:module && yarn build:browser-deps && yarn build:browser && yarn build:browser-cjs && yarn build:resolve-sourcemaps && yarn build:copy-lib
scripts.comment: mkdirp build/temp && browserify node_modules/hash.js/lib/hash.js --standalone hash -o build/temp/hash.js
scripts.unit: yarn build && yarn docs:html && yarn build:tests && nyc ava --verbose
scripts.watch: yarn build && yarn build:tests -- --no-browser && concurrently -r --kill-others 'npm run --silent build:main -- -w' 'npm run --silent build:tests -- -w --no-browser' 'sleepms 2000 && ava --watch'
scripts.cov: yarn unit && yarn html-coverage && opn coverage/index.html
scripts.docs:html: yarn jsdoc:core && yarn jsdoc:copy-asset && yarn jsdoc:deploy-lib
scripts.release_old: yarn r_e_s_e_t && yarn test && yarn docs:publish && yarn changelog
scripts.release: yarn test && yarn buildall && yarn docs:publish && yarn changelog
scripts.tt: yarn build && node config/exports/build-tests.ts && ava test/**/Tools.*.js

scripts-info.unit: Build the library and run unit tests
scripts-info.test: Lint, build, and test the library
scripts-info.watch: Watch source files, rebuild library on changes, rerun relevant tests
scripts-info.cov: Run tests, generate the HTML coverage report, and open it in a browser
scripts-info.docs:all: Generate HTML API documentation and open it in a browser
scripts-info.docs:publish: Generate HTML API documentation and push it to GitHub Pages
scripts-info.docs:json: Generate API documentation in typedoc JSON format
scripts-info.changelog: Bump package.json version, update CHANGELOG.md, tag a release
scripts-info.reset: Delete all untracked files and reset the repo to the last commit
scripts-info.release: Clean, build, test, publish docs, and prepare release (a one-step publish process)
